程序包 org.mockito.configuration

Mockito configuration utilities.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    AnnotationEngine 已过时
    Please use AnnotationEngine instead, this interface will probably be removed in mockito 3.
    IMockitoConfiguration
    Use it to configure Mockito.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    DefaultMockitoConfiguration
    DefaultConfiguration of Mockito framework Currently it doesn't have many configuration options but it will probably change if future.
